title: C160 Manage Financial Aid  | Yönerge
text: Künye Bilgisini Göster Units in Charge Owner: Student Resources(ÖK) Responsibles: Suppliers Input: Supplier in Charge: Customers Output: Customer Served: Performance Indicators Reporting Period Instruction Letter Procedure Form Scholarship and Financial Aid İhtiyaç Bursu Başvurusunun Uygun Görüldüğünü Bildiren Mektup (FSR-C16001-02) Çalışma Bursu Puantaj Formu FSR-C16001-03 Çalışma Bursu Uygulamaları Özet Tablo FSR-C16001-04 Main Endowment Scholarship Fund SU Main Endowment Scholarship Fund Employees Contribution Form (FSR-C16002-01) Language English
